strapiPost.title: Farmington Girls' Basketball Win 4A State Championship
strapiPost.content:
The Farmington Lady Cardinals Basketball secured the program's third-ever state championship last Thursday in Hot Springs after a close win against the Nashville Scrappers.

  • Our turn: After losing by one point to the same team in last year's state championship, the Cardinals returned to state this year with something to prove, defeating Nashville 65-61.
  • On the boys' side: Also competing in Hot Springs last weekend, the Springdale High Bulldogs were runners-up in the 6A boys' championship after facing Jonesboro, who secured their third consecutive state title.

Read more about the state championship game HERE.
